items.sentence: Do you think that Tom was really telling the truth?
Do you think that you should always tell the truth?
Tom said he didn\'t know who Mary\'s boyfriend was.
Tom said he didn\'t think he\'d be able to do that.
Tom met his wife when he was studying in Australia.
Tom offered Mary a drink of water, but she refused.
We shouldn\'t have done what Tom told us not to do.
Tom, I need to talk to you about something serious.
Tom got a tetanus shot after being bitten by a dog.
You don\'t have to worry about something like that.
